thread.title: ATM machine hijacked from Stony Plain pharmacy
thread.title_full: ATM machine hijacked from Stony Plain pharmacy

author: cbc
title: ATM machine hijacked from Stony Plain pharmacy
text:
RCMP are looking for two men suspected of breaking into a Stony Plain pharmacy and stealing an ATM machine.
The suspects were caught on video surveillance at about 4:50 a.m. at the Rexall pharmacy on 48th Street and 50th Avenue on Feb. 18, police said.
Men charged after homeowner catches break and enter in progress RCMP officer fires gun at break-in suspect after pepper spray incident RCMP say two men broke into the pharmacy at about 4:50 a.m. on Feb. 18. (Supplied)
Police said both men were about six feet tall with muscular builds and were wearing black masks at the time.
